text: Suhaas Nadukooru is a systems engineer with product intent. He designs systems that connect architecture to user needs and focuses on technical decisions that solve real problems.
He is currently pursuing an M.Tech in Software Engineering at the National University of Singapore and focuses on systems architecture, data pipelines, and product reasoning.
His approach combines systems architecture and product reasoning. He evaluates trade-offs, scalability, and maintainability as first-class concerns.
He brings product management and design exposure into engineering work, focusing on why systems are built, not just how they are built.
He has foundations in AI systems and RAG architecture, including retrieval pipelines, vector search, and language models integrated into larger systems.
SpaceFlow is a smart workplace platform case study exploring space booking, occupancy analytics, and AI-assisted insights with a modular service-oriented architecture.
The SpaceFlow project emphasizes service boundaries, API-first design, and separation of concerns across booking, occupancy, analytics, and AI insight components.
DocuMind (Insight Garden) is a full-stack document RAG SaaS where users upload PDFs and chat with documents through streaming answers with source attribution.
DocuMind stack includes React frontend, NestJS backend, pgvector retrieval, BullMQ for asynchronous jobs, and deployments across Vercel, Railway, Supabase, and Upstash.
The system emphasizes end-to-end product design: authentication, async document processing with progress states, hybrid retrieval, and SSE streaming.
Plant Disease Recognition System classifies plant leaf images into 38 disease or healthy classes with a CNN model and around 95 percent accuracy.
The project uses a single-source config and aligned data pipeline for both training and inference, with experiment tracking and a Streamlit app for usability.
EasyMeals is a concept case study on subscription-based healthy meal delivery for busy professionals, focused on product strategy and design thinking.
M.Tech in Software Engineering at the National University of Singapore with GPA 4 out of 5. Coursework emphasizes architectural reasoning and scalable system design.
B.Tech in Information Technology at Vellore Institute of Technology with CGPA 8.21 out of 10. Foundation includes programming, databases, web technologies, and software engineering.
Graduate certificates from NUS-ISS include Designing Modern Software Systems and Architecting Scalable Systems, covering architecture, reliability, and performance trade-offs.
AWS Cloud Practitioner certification demonstrates understanding of core cloud services, security fundamentals, and cost-aware architecture decisions.
Microsoft Azure AZ-104 certification covers Azure administration, resource management, and designing cloud infrastructure.
IBM Generative AI certification includes model fundamentals, prompt engineering, and practical integration of AI capabilities into applications.
Agile with Atlassian Jira certification covers agile methods, sprint planning, and team collaboration workflows.
Primary strengths include systems architecture and trade-off analysis, product reasoning aligned to user outcomes, and AI system integration with replaceable components.
Contact methods include email at nvijayasuhaas@gmail.com, LinkedIn profile, GitHub profile, and downloadable resume from the portfolio.
